EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-1-19 DXC Executive Partnership Update.1-19-2018 Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and DXC Executive Partnership Update 01.20.2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Below please find our weekly Executive Partnership Update. This weekly summary is sent to update stakeholders on progress across the partnership. There are a number of opportunities which are in the very final stages of procurement, so we look forward The teams across DXC and Turbonomic are driving hard to close the month strong and as always please let us know any questions or comments. Thanks,
Greg

Partnership News & Alerts
- FCC - Carrefour
Greg DiFraia will be in Europe next week with client meetings. If you have any suggested accounts for him to visit, please reach out. View a recently recorded webinar on AWS & Turbonomic here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-aws-webinar/]]>.
